Nina Cobb
=========

[City Council](https://www.killeentexas.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=7)  
Title: Councilmember District #3  
Phone: [254-317-1641](tel:2543171641)
  
[Email Nina Cobb](mailto:ncobb@killeentexas.gov)

  
  

Nina M. Cobb is widely considered a wonderful humanitarian, mother, and wife. She is married to Retired LTC Caesar D. Cobb, US Army. She is the mother of Caesar II, Daniel and David Cobb, the grandmother of Sawyer, Caesar III, Alicianna, and Kyson.

She currently serves as Councilmember District #3 for the City of Killeen and Past Parliamentarian for the NFL’s Professional Football Professional Mother’s Association.

Nina is employed as the Medical Response Emergency Nurse Coordinator for Bell County Public Health District. Her past time is spent reading and traveling. A member of Greater Vision Community Church and many organizations. She is the co-founder of ADN Beautillion Society, Inc.,

Her goal in life has always been quite simple: “to be the BEST Mother, Wife, Grandmother, Daughter, Sister, Neighbor and most importantly a servant of our GOD.”
